p: S. I. Ngulde, U. K. Sandabe, and I. M Hussaini designed the work, S. I. Ngulde performed the plant extraction, S. I. Ngulde, Y. Zhang, and R. Abounader participated in proliferation and invasion assays and western blotting, and S. I. Ngulde, U. K. Sandabe, and I. M. Hussaini prepared the manuscript, and it was approved by all the authors.
